name: Finn Fox- Adventure
description:
Finn Fox is a classic 2D jump and run game. The protagonist is a little fox named Finn. Finn's home lair and those of his friends and acquaintances were destroyed by nasty forest creatures and all foxes were driven out of the forest. For some time now, there has been a curse on the home forest. There is only one chance, Finn must make his way through the enchanted forest and find the source of all evil. This is the only way to be sure that the foxes can return to their forest.

In total, Finn has to complete 15 levels. In the process he encounters

Flying wasps

Spiders that drop from the ceiling

Enemies that fly after Finn when he is discovered

Hidden Zone

Swinging axes

Moving platforms

Falling platforms

Rotating knives

Boss opponents

Achievement system with 20 achievements.
